content: beaded and lacy this friendship bracelet is a great gift or make some for yourself pattern uses the smaller pony beads but they can be swapped for some other choices or even lettered beads to spell out a message or name if you use a different bead or thread make sure your hook will fit through the bead when it also has thread on it this can sometimes be tricky if changing thread size or bead size if using lettered beads this pattern gives the beads a slight zigzag orientation so take that into account if that will be a problem for names or messages in beaded letters feel free to check out the other free patterns on my website
